name: Watch the weather change
description:
Watch The Weather Change is a fable about surrender and loss where the player will have to learn to let go.

Nobu begins to lose his most basic abilities: vision, hearing... and begins to sense that his mother antenna is failing. Seeing that he could gradually lose everything, he decides to make a journey to his salvation. Nobu will have to reach his antenna before his vital functions fail completely.

Rich and atmospheric world with unique characters. 

Handcrafted visual style, analog elements and traditional animation.

Experience the sensory decline of the protagonist and the adversities he faces.

❗This demo is not intended as a gameplay but to capture the aesthetics and atmosphere of the game❗
